name: "Warmth"
effect: Restores 14% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 350 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Thoma's specialty. The intricate appearance of this dish belies the simple ingredients used. But take a sip, and Thoma's sunshine smile comes straight to mind. Perhaps this is his special ability: warming the hearts of others using the simplest of ingredients.
